tool_description: This API is having the power to give you download links to videos and Images. Pinterest shorten video link supported.
name: Social Media Download API
title: Social Media Download API

api_list.name: Instagram
api_list.description:
## Instagram Endpoint:

This API endpoint is used to fetch the download link of videos, images, and posts from the Instagram platform. All you need to do is provide the shared link of the Instagram post you want to download.

By making a GET request to this endpoint with the shared link as a parameter, the API will return the download link for the video or image in the response.

The API will also support shorten links from Instagram, so you do not have to worry about expanding the shorten link first. The API will handle that for you.

The API endpoint supports retrieving the media in its original quality, so you can get the best quality content possible.

## Example of using the Instagram endpoint:
`
GET https://api.example.com/instagram?url=<shared_link>

Response:
{
  "url": "https://example.com/download/instagram_post.mp4",
  "type": "video"
}
`

api_list.name: Pinterest
api_list.description:
## Pinterest endpoint
The Pinterest endpoint of the API accepts a Pinterest shorten URL and returns the expanded URL of the post. The endpoint takes the shorten URL as an input and returns the long URL of the post in the response. The endpoint uses the Pinterest URL shortener API to expand the shorten URL and return the original URL of the post.

This endpoint is designed for developers who want to access the original URL of a Pinterest post without having to manually expand the shorten URL. With this endpoint, developers can easily fetch the post URL and other information about the post from Pinterest by simply providing the shorten URL.

To make a request to this endpoint, developers need to pass the shorten URL as a parameter in the API request. The response of the API will be a JSON object containing the long URL of the post. The JSON object may also include additional information such as the post's title and description, which can be used by developers to enhance their applications.

Overall, the Pinterest endpoint of the API provides a convenient and efficient way for developers to access original URLs of Pinterest posts, allowing them to build more robust and useful applications.

## Example of using the Instagram endpoint:
`
GET https://api.example.com/pinterest?url=<shared_link>

Response:
{
  "url": "https://example.com/download/pinterest_video.mp4",
  "type": "video"
}
`
